title: Downright Delinquents.
description: Hayley Larson is the girl everyone wants to be. She is a model, has amazing friends, and has a perfect life. All of this is until her father is brutally murdered. Her perfect life spins out of control and she still hasn't picked up the pieces, which is why she is sent to Downright High, the school for delinquents. Here, Hayley finds herself in a mixture of trouble, ranging from enemies, fights, riots to even falling in love. Will Hayley end up getting her life back on track or will this school end her, once and for all?
author: L.  Jackson
